timeline.bodyText: The T&G manager needs to inform the SB manager about the latest mainField1 value so the SB manager doesn't send a SHOW with outdated value and override mainField1. Especially if the T&G modified the mainField1 value internally (for example to assemble multiple texts in one line). The SB manager has no way to know the latest value for the mainField1
